title: SEO Tools Improvements
details:
We've made adjustments and improvements to our in-app SEO tools:

- ✅ **Slug editing** — Editable straight from the SEO tool
- ✅ **Link Detection/Analysis** — Inaccurate results patched to display accurate results
- ✅ **Search Preview** — Redesigned for better alignment and display
- ✅ **Analysis Summary** — Improved to give better recommendations
